channel.title: ::openbank (player) command
channel.description:
is there away to make a code to open other players banks?
if there is please post and i'm thinking you can edit bank command to some how open other players bank that what i think

item.title: ::openbank (player) command
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:39, topic:260419”][quote author=Jddogg9 link=topic=343841.msg2879822#msg2879822 date=1248276378]
isn’t that why there is a “ctrl + f” command that lets you search for a player? MAGIC!

then… if your not that lazy… go search the item id you don’t want them or you think they have and tadah! you have either found a duper or wasted your time!(:
[/quote]

You are fucking stupid. 1.) This is from February. 2.) Your attempt at sounding smart by being a sarcastic smartass has failed. I remember this topic from a long time ago. Using the method you said works, but as it’s been stated, back in February, loading the player’s bank from your account is far more convenient. Why did you post on this anyways?[/quote]

woah woah woah, acting like a freak eh? (:

i was just trying to help, oh i’m so sorry i didn’t look at the god damn date.
next time i’ll surely put some effort into doing that for you

Read full topic

item.title: ::openbank (player) command

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:38, topic:260419”]isn’t that why there is a “ctrl + f” command that lets you search for a player? MAGIC!

then… if your not that lazy… go search the item id you don’t want them or you think they have and tadah! you have either found a duper or wasted your time!(:[/quote]

You are fucking stupid. 1.) This is from February. 2.) Your attempt at sounding smart by being a sarcastic smartass has failed. I remember this topic from a long time ago. Using the method you said works, but as it’s been stated, back in February, loading the player’s bank from your account is far more convenient. Why did you post on this anyways?

[/quote]

if you had 50k+ then you wouldnt even bother looking through thousands of them because i bet at least per person had like 2 accounts each.

you could just make a new acc and copy their character file into ur file and login…[/quote]That made no sense.

item.title: ::openbank (player) command
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

tottbomber:

=S the overloading is hard to understand i understand must but still =S

It’s just a matter of declaring a method that already exists but with different parameters.
Just declare the method I posted and call the openUpBank method to open your bank then call the new resetBank method to view the other player’s items.

Read full topic
